saying: Squeak softly and carry a big stick.
description: Samson is a jock, mouse villager from the Animal Crossing series, who has appeared in all of the games so far, with the exception of Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp. His catchphrase, "pipsqueak", is based on the sound made by mice and the term "pipsqueak", which means "little". His Japanese catchphrase, "chū", is based on the Japanese onomatopoeia for a mouse's squeaking, "chūchū" (ちゅうちゅう).  His favorite saying in Animal Crossing: New Leaf is a pun on Theodore Roosevelt's famous quote "Speak softly and carry a big stick.", meaning to always be wary of your neighbors.
